snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel has canceled most of her meetings for the next three weeks after she was injured over the Christmas holiday.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel has canceled most of her meetings for three weeks after doctors order her to rest in bed following a fall while cross-country skiing in Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel has canceled most of her meetings for the next three weeks after she was injured over the Christmas holiday.

headline.main: German Leader Injured in Skiing Accident
headline.print_headline: Germany: Merkel Injured in a Fall
